isis.stitle: EC-17 ANTILOCK TRACTION CONTROLLER - EC-17 CONTROLLER CONFIGURATION

important.para: The following information and procedure can be used with the DCI Diagnostic Communication Interface. The DCI or its related computer program can be used to reconfigure the controller.

step1.para: All LEDs on the DCI will illuminate then go out.
The number of active sensors will be displayed by the momentary illumination of the red SEN (sensor) LED and two or more of the red locating LEDs. No other LEDs will be on.

step2.para: SEN + FRT (front) + RER (rear) = A four sensor configuration (all systems must have at least a 4 sensor configuration).
SEN + FRT + MID (middle) + RER = A six sensor configuration.

step1.para: The red TRC LED will momentarily illuminate by itself if traction control torque limiting is active; if not, then the display will go to the condition described in #5.
The red TRC and MOD LEDs will momentarily illuminate if traction control differential braking is active, if not, then the display will go to the condition described in #6. No other LEDs will be on.
The diagnostic display will return to its normal operational system, all red LEDs will be off and the single, green, VLT LED is illuminated.
